text: @funder At what age threshold are kids seemingly NOT at risk for COVID-19? Per China&Korea’s experience is anyone under 20 (healthy w/o pre-existing conditions) catching Coronavirus? We must know to understand virus & to help design vaccine—at what age thresholds does virus ignore & Why?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
